description:
In an orientation exercise for the new students to get to know each other, Sayuri is paired with Ryou, the boy she met before the entrance ceremony. As the son of a Japanese sweets maker, Ryou shows everyone that the confectionery arts are already ingrained in him. After seeing Ryou`s work, the three instructors also show their skills! Sayuri, who got into the school on a scholarship, finds new determination after seeing their surprising techniques.
Source: crunchyroll
